# makeSamplerState(descriptor:)

**Instance Method**

Creates a sampler state instance.

## Declaration

```swift
func makeSamplerState(descriptor: MTLSamplerDescriptor) -> (any MTLSamplerState)?
```

## Parameters

- **descriptor**: An [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLSamplerDescriptor] instance.

## Return Value

A new [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLSamplerState] instance if the method completed successfully; otherwise `nil`.

## Creating samplers

- **supportsTextureSampleCount(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the GPU can sample a texture with a specific number of sample points.
- **getDefaultSamplePositions(sampleCount:)**: Returns the default sample locations based on the number of samples.
